data.eml:eml: The Elachistinae (Lepidoptera: Gelechioidea: Elachistidae) of Ecuador with descriptions of five new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sruoga, Virginijus (2010): The Elachistinae (Lepidoptera: Gelechioidea: Elachistidae) of Ecuador with descriptions of five new species. Zootaxa 2524: 33-50, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.294129
